name: Bella
story: Bella is a sweet girl who loves to play fetch and go for long walks. She's great with kids and gets along well with other dogs. She came to us as a stray but has quickly adjusted to shelter life. She's eager to find her forever home!

compatibility.children: Good with children of all ages.
compatibility.otherPets: Good with other dogs, unknown with cats.

name: Oliver
story: Oliver is a calm and independent cat who enjoys sunbeams and quiet afternoons. He's a bit shy at first but warms up quickly once he trusts you. Perfect companion for someone looking for a low-key friend.

compatibility.children: Prefers a quiet home, older children only.
compatibility.otherPets: Prefers to be the only cat, unknown with dogs.

name: Coco
story: Coco is a charming older lady who loves sniffing around the yard and enjoys gentle walks. She's past her energetic puppy days and is looking for a comfortable retirement home where she can get lots of pets and naps.
medicalHistory: Up-to-date on vaccinations, spayed, needs joint supplement.

compatibility.otherPets: Okay with calm dogs, unknown with cats.

name: Peanut
story: Peanut is an adorable and friendly rabbit who enjoys playtime outside his hutch and gentle head scratches. He's looking for a home where he can be part of the family.

compatibility.children: Good with children who understand how to handle rabbits gently.

name: Shadow
tagline: Sleek and mysterious, found his forever home!
story: Shadow is a gorgeous black cat who was adopted last month. He quickly settled into his new home and loves playing hide-and-seek.
